data.what_is: ContactDB is an integrated B2B marketing company that specializes in providing top quality data-related solutions and targeted outsourced marketing services.
data.product_description: ContactDB is an integrated B2B marketing company that specializes in providing top quality data-related solutions and targeted outsourced marketing services.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ContactDB?
I love the website and how easy it is to use. A lot of other marketing sites do not have a functional website. For a user, this is a deal-breaker on whether or not a company will use it/refer it.

What do you dislike about ContactDB?
I know that I hate receiving telemarketing phone calls, so from an outside prospective, a random dial may not be conformation with this.

What problems is ContactDB solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been able to solve my companies problem when it comes to switching back and forth between cutomers and employees.
